text:
Téléprocédures simplifiées | Ruby on Rails developer | Paris , France | Onsite | https://tps.apientreprise.fr/

We're building a government-backed Google Forms for the french administration: we help public actor digitalize their forms and thus help public agents as well as citizens and companies save time.

We're a small team (3 developers) looking for another Ruby on Rails developer to help us ship new features, implement our new UI, and improve the quality of our codebase.

Stack: Rails 5, RSpec, GitHub, CircleCI (CI + CD), Sentry, Skylight. Our code is open source: https://github.com/sgmap/tps

Apply: contact@tps.apientreprise.fr
